name: one?
description:
A respectful request.

Download games from ArTime in official stores.

----------------------------------------------------------

"one?" is a puzzle platformer with unusual mechanics, made in pixel art style.

The main task at each level is to get to the portal. But the portal may not be accessible due to a door that only opens when a button is pressed, or due to the height of the platform on which it stands.

More about Artime:

VK - https://vk.com/artime_12

Twitter - https://twitter.com/ArtimeDelta

Google Play - https://play.google.com/store/apps/developer?id=ArTime

itch.io - https://artime.itch.io
